title: Scout, Volume II
description: Scout, originally published in 1987 and created by Timothy Truman, features the Native American hero, Emanuel Santana, and his one-man war against oppressive governmental forces in a post-apocalyptic United States. Now, this revered and powerful series is re-mastered and presented to a new generation This volume features issues #7-15 of the series, remastered and recolored for this volume, and features a new, original cover by Truman, plus a bonus gallery of original covers.
author: Timothy Truman
